basic.floral_language:
Murraya paniculata 
Floriography: white, noble, youthful
Is a small woody plant, evergreen, leaves fresh green in oval shape, flowers are clustered on the top of stems, normally 5 petals, has elegant fragrance. Often used for landscaping in yards, roadsides, or bonsai for indoor decoration. 
Likes sunshine, suitable for sunny places, avoid scorching sunlight in summer. Flowers are white.
basic.blooming: Foliage plants, sometimes flowers, white flowers

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, avoid scorching light in summer
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and autumn
